overview: Alexis Tae and her partner list the moved that move them in "You Know What I Want". Scarlett Bloom is caught off guard when her partner grants her most forbidden fantasy in "Familiar Strangers". Allie Nicole dives into the fight so as to ride the high of make up sex in "Where Were You". Vina Sky is Aaron's fantasy come to life in "Flower Girl." Each dives deeper down the rabbit hole of what makes them tick.
title: Between The Lines
